name: Trackdesk for WooCommerce
author: Trackdesk

sections.description:
WordPress Affiliate Tracking Plugin

Trackdesk is an affiliate software with fair pricing that allows you to launch your affiliate, referral, and partnership marketing program with $0 initial investment. Enjoy all the essential features to get started, completely free, until your monthly revenue reaches $1,000. Once you’re ready to upgrade, you’ll find the best deal on the market with plans starting at just $67 per month!

Our affiliate tracking software seamlessly integrates with the WooCommerce plugin. Simply download the plugin and set up the Trackdesk tracking code on your WordPress website with just one click.

Why pay more when you can pay less for the better service? We offer a seamless migration, handling the entire transition from your current solution.

For detailed instructions on tracking setup, visit:
https://help.trackdesk.com/en/articles/7188110-woocommerce-plugin-integration

To explore all the features, please visit:
https://trackdesk.com/pricing

Certain Notable Features

  • Automatic integration with the WooCommerce plugin
  • Subscriptions tracking from the plugin “WooCommerce Subscriptions”
  • Error log that shows errors that occurred on the store side
  • Automatic tracking of order statuses
  • Customizable commission structure
  • Individual affiliate access with dashboard
  • Place for creative assets to share
  • Great customer support
  • #1 Partnership Managers Marketplace

Support

If you need support or think you found a bug, contact us here.
sections.installation:
1. Install easily with the WordPress plugin control panel or manually download the plugin and upload the folder trackdesk-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Fill required fields and enable plugin functionality in the settings (Admin > WooCommerce > Trackdesk)
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Add: Support for Woo Subscriptions plugin
  • Add: Remote request logs

1.0.0

  • Initial public release to the WordPress plugin repository

short_description: Integrating the trackdesk tracking code into your WordPress website is simple and quick.
